Posts.Content: OH Eleanor! Wow, huge milestone! I cant say Im happy for you, as I know how sad it is, but I will say Im proud of you, for just going for it. How does the wig look? As normal as possible? More importantly how are you feeling a few weeks out. HUGS and MORE HUGS to you! Diane
Posts.Title: Shaved it!

Posts.Content: i wish i  had an answer for you but  I'm in the same  boat.  diagnosis 11.15, lumpectomy 12/3, chemo port surgery tomorrow. i  have Not gone a day yet without several outbursts. it seems to just come over me in uncontrolable waves. hope we both can get to a point where it subsides
Posts.Title: When does the crying stop

Posts.Content: So, where are the new improvements? Still slow to load, still no direct way back to this board after looking at your profile, can any one point out anything that has changed other that a very slightly different look to the list of posts? You cannot respond to posts, it lets you preview, but when you hit submit, it just loops back to the preview And what happened to the link that was on the side bar for private messages (called csn email) *edit* ok now csn email link back, but all previous messages are gone And what's up with the formatting tips below the post window? It assumes everybody who participates here is a web programmer. I was hoping for better, I guess.. Oh well
Posts.Title: new site, same problems, and missing csn email?
